html.h3: This form enables easy mapping of correlation searches/rules to MITRE ATT&CK Techniques. Once you're done with mappings and updates, you may want to run setup manually in order to generate the overall lookup files or wait until the scheduled searches run.

table.title: If you are getting 'No results found' then mapping for the rule name already exists. You will need to edit the lookup file manually.
